bill.title: Reproductive freedom.
bill.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by adding Section 1.1 to Article I thereof, relating to fundamental rights.

history.action: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From printer.
Referred to Coms. on JUD., E. & C.A., and APPR.
Set for hearing June 14.
Set for hearing June 14 in E. & C.A. pending receipt.
Set for hearing June 16 in APPR pending receipt.
From committee: Be adopted and re-refer to Com. on E. & C.A. (Ayes 9. Noes 1. Page 4206.) (June 14). Re-referred to Com. on E. & C.A.
From committee: Be adopted and re-refer to Com. on APPR. (Ayes 3. Noes 1. Page 4206.) (June 14). Re-referred to Com. on APPR.
Senate Rules suspended
(Ayes 25. Noes 9. Page 4259.)
From committee: Be adopted. (Ayes 5. Noes 2. Page 4278.) (June 16).
Read second time. Ordered to third reading.
Read. Adopted. (Ayes 29. Noes 8. Page 4306.) Ordered to the Assembly.
In Assembly. Read first time. Held at Desk.
Assembly Rule 46 suspended. (Ayes 54. Noes 17.)
Referred to Com. on JUD.
From committee: Be adopted. (Ayes 7. Noes 2.) (June 23).
Read. Adopted. Ordered to the Senate.
In Senate. Ordered to engrossing and enrolling.
Enrolled and filed with the Secretary of State at 11:30 a.m.
Chaptered by Secretary of State. Res. Chapter 97, Statutes of 2022.

votes.desc: Be adopted, but first be re-referred to the Committee on [Appropriations]
Be adopted, but first be re-referred to the Committee on [Elections and Constitutional Amendments]
Senate 3rd Reading SCA10 Atkins et al
SCA 10 Atkins Senate Third Reading By RENDON
